name: Build A-Dream
desc: This website has been through many iterations, from pure HTML & CSS whilst learning web development to Svelte when learning my first framework.
Recently been re-written  using React & Astro to ensure the best performance and latest techologies.

name: Galacticraft
desc: Built using Nuxt & Sanity.io CMS to create a blog website for a minecraft mod with over 15 million total downloads.
Taking advantage of my custom component library to speed up development

name: Component library
desc: Custom component library built on Vue & Vite for custom component which are fast & reliable.
Used to speed up development and have a standard across projects.
